attributes.action: To withdraw Great Britain from the European Union and to forge closer relations with Commonwealth and former Colonies and so help to preserve our British heritage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU, if it is not stopped, will eventually have unlimited power over our country, even above our Parliaments and Monarch.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
